titleStmt.title: John Barclay his vindication of the intercession of saints, the veneration of relicks and miracles, against the sectaries of the times Book II. Chap. VII. Englished by a person of quality. With allowance.
Parænesis ad sectarios. Book 2, Chapter 7. English.
titleStmt.author: Barclay, John, 1582-1621.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Mary Thompson at the entrance into Old-Spring-Garden near Charing-Cross: and sold by Matthew Turner at the Holy-Lamb in Holbourn; and John Lane at the corner of Wild-street,

notesStmt.note: A translation of Book 2, chapter 7 of: Barclay, John. Parænesis ad sectarios.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
